title: The Reaper
desc:
Post 3500
*All our times have come*
*Here but now they're gone*
*Seasons don't fear the reaper*
Basic/Invincible
Reap a player at night. If your target dies, they become a Restful Spirit right away. If they don't die, they receive the message *"You feel a shiver down your spine. It's almost as if Death itself was watching."* and a Basic attack. If this Basic Attack is what kills your target, they become a Vengeful Spirit
You can choose to Reap a Vengeful Spirit instead, which puts them at rest.
